readability_reflection: I found string interpolation to be more readable because it is easier to replace the interpolaion while reading, instead of having to see the + symbol.
comprehension_debugging: Using concatenation looks harder to debug because if there are parentheses or quotation symbols, it is hard to tell what is included in the new string.
preference_rationale: I would use string interpolation because it is easier to read and easier to debug.
learning_curve: I had some trouble initially with string interpolation because I rarely used it in past assignments. After remembering how it worked, the more complicated strings were easier to understand with string interpolation.
suggestions_improvement: I have no suggestions or recommendations for the syntax to be improved.
